text: we all have different perspectives based
on the unique experiences of our lives
sharing those experiences with others is
how we expand our knowledge and
understanding
at aws
different perspectives lead to better
solutions so building a diverse
workforce is good for business
as a senior technical recruiter my job
is to bring new perspectives to our
company
we're also looking for people who
approach challenges and problem solve
well we are constantly looking to
improve ourselves
for me it's figuring out how to do my
job better from improving our recruiting
process to connecting with hard to find
talent to helping them present their
best self during the assessment and
interviews i love that we can make a
difference in people's lives at aws we
strive to be the world's best employer
and to do that
is up to me to find the world's best
employees my name is darius robinson and
i
am a builder
